Your character is capable of attribute training since Level 1, but this training has a daily limit. The more you train, better will be your results in battles, in dojo NPC even with your enemies. The days NOT trained, will be cumulated: For example, if you can\'t train tuesday and wednesday, at thursday you can train the sum of tuesday, wednesday and thursday. At Tuesdays, the week limit is renewed, even you do not have trained, then, ever try train your week limit until mondays. The Attribute Training is key to have a good character, so, never forget to training it
You can do the Manual Training many times a day.

Welcome student. Today we are going to start your life as a ninja. If you really want to become one of the best ninjas in your village, you will have to study hard and practice a lot. Start studying now and follow the necessary steps to become a Genin.
Who said your walk to becoming a Shinobi would be easy? You still have a lot to learn, go to the second lesson.
You\'re doing well! Some more lessons and maybe you can become a Genin. Continue your arduous journey of success.
Congratulations, you are doing great, you are learning fast and soon you will become a great ninja! Keep studying.
Training is everything. A ninja who does not train has a weak mind and body. You need to train your skills whenever you can. Keep learning, reading is also part of your learning.

You are close to becoming a Genin, but you still need to complete some classes. Be patient as it takes many years to become a \"Kage\" to become the village leader. Who knows if you study hard you will not become the \"Kage\" of your village.
To become one of the best ninjas you must also be polite to your companions, respect others and always help. These are also important steps in your journey to becoming a Ninja.
Who would say! Not long ago you were just a simple student and now you are close to becoming a Genin. Congratulations, you are doing very well and there is little left to become a great Ninja.
I can see that you have been practicing a lot and, with that, you have become stronger. You are correctly following the ninja path and soon you will be receiving your bandana.

Like an old Sensei, I always get emotional when a student graduates! You went through many things and overcame all obstacles. Now I have nothing more to teach. Let\'s do your last lesson and with that, you will be very close to becoming a ninja. Keep practicing for the Genin exam. Train your skills as much as you can and very soon you will be becoming a Genin, then receiving your Bandana.
Your ninja walk is going well. Congratulations your first lesson is finished!
Your ninja walk is going well. Congratulations for another finished lesson.

This was the last lesson. From now on you must follow alone, to form as a Genin you must enter battles in the DOJO and train a lot in the academy, once you have the minimum requirements go to GRADUATIONS at the Academy and get ready to become a Genin.

Your first day after the ninja academy, today you will receive your bandana and graduating with a ninja village. With this degree you can explore what\'s beyond the gate of the village, fight enemies, make allies, perform different types of missions, learn basic moves and help protect your village. Do not forget to continue your training to just reach the next graduation.

Graduated Ninja with high level of confidence in the town, has great knowledge in the art and has ninja skills to control the first element, doing missions riskier Rank C, can participate in teams and organizations and participate in tournaments ninjas.

Ninja with a great level of knowledge about the art ninja and battles, has many specialties such as controlling the second element, doing the most dangerous missions of B rank level, may be responsible for an organization and can also participate in various tournaments between Jounins.

Hunters are known as Special ANBU, or (Squadron Special Assassination and Tactical). Become an ANBU is to have the recognition of being a ninja reputable within their village. You can learn many different moves, doing missions for level A, can join tournaments and events, you can learn the last level of the seal or sennin mode.

They are extraordinary ninjas, ninjas able to use a very large amount of jutsus and lead a battle there last long. They can learn the latest skills and invocation clan, participate in tournaments, teams and organizations leading to invade and wage war against other villages, is uniquely capable of performing missions level S and the closest of becoming Kages.

Every ninja dreams of becoming a Hero. A person known and loved by all the people of the village, and often globally known. Heroes can do all kinds of missions, has the largest number of skills Ninjutsu, Taijutsu, Genjutsu trained. S or SS performs missions that are riskier and defend the village with all the forces and if necessary with Life itself.
You begin to steal villages and farmers, and becomes a wanted rank D.
With some skill of the underworld, you begin to feel the power and insanity within you, being able to do some murders if necessary.
Equivalent to the force of a Jounin, you become more skilled and able to control two elements perfectly, destroying entire villages.
Are moved through the darkness, acting surreptitiously and killing all who get in his way. It is able to track targets, as well as ANBUs
As strong as a Sannin, becoming practically the renegade strongest Akatsuki. Your head is one of the most wanted with a high reward on it.

The strongest ninja of Akatsuki, his knowledge and power can not be compared to any other graduate. To become a leader, the ninja needs to go through all grades and still become the best among the best. They can do all kinds of missions, has the largest number of skills Ninjutsu, Taijutsu and Genjutsu trained. S or SS performs missions that are riskier and Akatsuki defend with all their might and if necessary with their lives.

Miss Haruna is planning a special dinner for his 50th birthday to two months. The date is close, but there is still a very special ingredient to make your stew. This ingredient, a mushroom can be found in the forest next to the village.You have to scan it, and then take it to the house of Mrs. Haruna, but pay attention, there are many mushrooms in the forest, and the recipe is rare to find yourself. Inue is very sad. Because she lost her pearl pendant necklace that her mother gave her. This necklace is a treat for the family, as the mother of the inue gained from her mother, who won his mother… The last time she played near the entrance of the village, go look, because he must have fallen on the floor.
Mimi is the kitten Nagare. She is very sad and missing you. You should look Mimi throughout the village and give it the Nagare. But be quick, because the kitten is very aloof and smart!

We had a terrible storm lately! Go find people who have disappeared in this storm, fast!
It seems that once again that old pervert spying on women walking. Go solve it.

Go right until the top of the mountain which is on the side of our village and take the purple and white flowers that Yuki both want to deliver to his wife. Take flowers enough to make a beautiful bouquet. Yuki is waiting at the entrance of the village.

There will be a party at Tent Ramen. Help build the tables, put the cloths and flowers to decorate. Clean the floor and make sure to put the flags hanging from the ceiling, to get everything perfect!

How to become accustomed to playing all night, just to see if the owner closing his eyes, he starts barking. Ikky is getting very nervous. Help him to sleep, distracting your puppy.

The Kage needs your help! He loves flowers and believes they leave the village more beautiful! And he has every reason! Then pour all the flowers of the village, leaving our village beautiful and alive, full of life and color!

Disaster struck! Finished all the Ramen noodles Store! Help the Lord Koto doing more mass ramem! Be thoughtful and precise, because the mass of noodles need out perfect as we always do!
A recent storm we had in our village roofs destroyed some of our residents. Go help them fix these roofs, before the rain comes and the houses are unprotected.

Lady Dona Shui is a very friendly and kind, all the village like it, Unfortunately, her husband died last week and she feels very alone. Stay with it a bit, eating rice balls, and reading books for her books that she likes so much!
Karui, Kim and Souta are a group of friends who love to have fun. But one member is missing for them to play cards in pairs. Spend the afternoon with them, this group completing the game!

Now that you already have some experience, its mission is to patrol the outskirts of the village. Remember that even so should avoid fighting and asking for reinforcements! Do not play the hero (yet!).

In the forests near the village, there are bears that are acting strangely, there are suspicions that these bears are being manipulated by enemy ninjas in some village, through some Bijuu chakra. Defeat some bears and collecting samples of their hair to be examined in our laboratory.
